basic.description: In this course students expand their knowledge of intaglio techniques beyond the basics learned in the fundamentals of printmaking course. Students learn contemporary non-toxic intaglio techniques including color printing, drypoint, chine colle, soft ground etching, line etching, aquatint, photo etching and traditional and experimental printing. May be repeated to a maximum of nine semester hours.
basic.subject: ART
basic.title: Intaglio Printmaking: Etching
